title: Grid 2 Multiplayer crack + all DLC's by empe4
description:
IMPORTANT: Create a new Steam Account with a new Email address!

1. Install GRID 2 (you can download and install this repack

2. Download and Install Update V1.0.85.8679 

3. Copy all content from ''Grid 2 MP crack + DLC's'' to main Grid 2 folder

4. Download and Install Steam Client

5. (optional) Download latest GreenLuma and extract it to your Steam Folder

6. Run Steam/Greenluma and Login

8. Start the Game

9.Go to Grid Online and join any Server

Have Fun


to change language edit steam_api.ini and revolt.ini



note: Multiplayer crack was download from here http://revolt.loginto.me/index.php?/topic/173-grid-2/?hl=grid
and DLC's from here http://cs.rin.ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=63074&start=840 
( -classic grid
-bathurst 
-peak performance(fixed files)
steam_api.ini + revolt.ini was edited by me for dlc fix
